biotools.summary: Suite of software tools that guides the user through the multiple hierarchical scales of cellular behavior, facilitating the generation of comprehensive models. It was originally created to simulate immunological phenomena, but it is applicable to a very broad class of cell biological models.

bioschemas.name: Simmune
